entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
